name: Etherpath
description:
A post-apocalyptic platformer about a boy who needs to get a medicinal herb. Use a gravity defying spear to navigate your way through levels (and maybe even enemies).

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Fire

More about the controls:

- Exit the grapple with either jump (space) or down (S key)

- Holding down the mouse button leads the player toward the grapple's location, but not holding down the mouse button keeps the player in place.
